titles: After our hearty commendations; whereas by the Act of Parliament now lately passed, for granting a supply to His Majesty of 206462 l. 17 s. 3 d. for paying off, and disbanding the forces raised since the 29th of September 1677 we are authorized to issue the money thereby granted without any privy seal or other warrant from the King, ...
notes: Title taken from opening lines of text.
A form with blanks filled in with MS.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
